data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
When you take 10 steps forward you are moving forward. When you take 10 steps backward you are going backward. So, the answer is No.

Turn around and turn around. Similarly there are other ways to do this (including turning right). So, the answer is Yes.

The instructions always tell you to always face forward. If you do not always face forward, you will do several incorrect things.
